title: Week 6 NFL Power Rankings: 1-32 poll, plus helping every team make the playoffs
description: Through five games, here's how we see the entire NFL. Where do the Bills, Giants and Titans rank?

title: Jarrett still in 'disbelief' over flagged Brady hit
description: Still in "disbelief" over getting penalized for sacking Bucs QB Tom Brady, Atlanta Falcons DT Grady Jarrett called for the NFL to consider in-game reviews of roughing the passer penalties.

title: WR Adams pushes person postgame, apologizes
description: Davante Adams shoved a credentialed person on the field carrying equipment in the aftermath of the Raiders' loss Monday night, later issuing an apology.

title: Source: NFL to mull roughing rules after season
description: The NFL plans to discuss roughing the passer penalties after the season amid outrage over two disputed calls in Week 5, a member of the league's competition committee, who wishes to remain anonymous told ESPN's Ed Werder.

title: Ref defends roughing penalty that drew Chiefs' ire
description: Referee Carl Cheffers explained why he threw a flag for roughing the passer after Chiefs DT Chris Jones stripped Raiders QB Derek Carr.

title: Raiders don't second-guess failed 2-point attempt
description: Neither Raiders coach Josh McDaniels nor his players were second-guessing a crucial decision to go for 2 points while down 30-29 late in Monday night's loss to the Chiefs.

title: Panthers fire HC Rhule, DC Snow after 1-4 start
description: The Panthers fired coach Matt Rhule on Monday after a 1-4 start to the season and with four seasons left on a seven-year, $62 million contract he received in 2020.

title: Bolts' Staley 'closer' with Allen after critical tweet
description: Chargers coach Brandon Staley says he grew "closer" with Keenan Allen after his tweet critical of Staley's decision to go for it on fourth down late in Sunday's loss.

title: Rivera has 'no regrets' about acquiring QB Wentz
description: With his team in last place in the NFC East, three games behind the field, Washington Commanders coach Ron Rivera said he had no regrets about trading for quarterback Carson Wentz.

title: How do the 1-4 Steelers move on after Buffalo debacle?
description: The Steelers were trounced in Buffalo, and just might be rebuilding after all.

title: Commanders in familiar spot, but already running out of time
description: This season a late surge might not be enough to get the team back into playoff contention.

title: Kelce, Chiefs rally from 17-point deficit to take down Raiders
description: The Chiefs fought a 17-0 deficit and some questionable officiating to rally behind Kelce's four scores.

title: The magic behind the New York Giants' 4-1 start
description: The Giants are 4-1 following an upset over Aaron Rodgers and the Packers. Here's how they got here.

title: Lamar to the rescue: How the Ravens' QB saved the day after rough start
description: For more than three quarters vs. the Bengals, Jackson was not having his best night, but when the game was on the line, he showed his MVP form.

title: Daily Notes: Darren Waller exits MNF early, Josh Jacobs thriving
description: Darren Waller suffered a hamstring injury early in Monday's game, Josh Jacobs put up another terrific performance and we check in on the status of key players injured Sunday heading into Week 6 and the start of bye weeks.

title: Week 5 recap: Denver's offense, Taysom Hill's staying power, and more
description: Our NFL Nation reporters focus on injury news, changes in roles and other pressing questions.

title: With Rhule gone, what's next for the Panthers?
description: The Panthers let Matt Rhule go after losing 11 of their past 12 games. What does their future look like now?

title: Cheat codes, safeties and the best of the bad beats of the week
description: Jason Fitz recaps some of the weirdest plays from the weekend through social media.
